abstractText: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript with the Abhisamayālaṅkāra and the Prajñāpāramitāstotra preceding the Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā. According to the bilingual colophon (Sanskrit and Newari), this manuscript was commissioned in Kathmandu, in the Mantrasiddhi Mahāvihāra by the Vajrācārya Śākyamuni , and written by the scribe Vajrācārya Indramuni.
abstractShort: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript with the Abhisamayālaṅkāra and the Prajñāpāramitāstotra preceding the Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā
title: Abhisamayālaṅkāra, Prajñāpāramitāstotra, Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā
